alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Gusty showers and storms will impact western Olmsted, northwestern Mower and Dodge Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers and storms along a line extending from near Faribault to Hollandale. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Surface observations and radar. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This line of showers and storms will be near... Claremont around 1155 PM CDT. Dodge Center, Hayfield, and West Concord around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Eden, Rock Dell, Brookside Campground, and Mayville. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 175 and 181. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
